ComicInfo.Title: Drink Freezca and Stir Up a Blizzard!; Los Angeles Balance; The Dumb-Dumb People!; What's It Going to Cost in 1980?; The Waiter and the Customers; Vacancy Sign; How Wise Are Wise Old Proverbs?; Cracked Looks at TV Commercials; The Completely Rebuilt Person; Cracked Looks at Dating; Training the Dog; What People Would Do If They Banned Other Things Besides Cyclamates; You Know There's a Generation Gap When...; Those Old-Time Radio Serials or Ma Gherkins -- She's Always in a Pickle
ComicInfo.Summary: British editions are identical to the US editions except for the price and cover date. The UK numbering includes Cracked Collectors' Editions.Hudd and Dini leave behind a vacancy sign after escaping prison.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev36 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-04-05 17:39:13. [Issue ID 250459]
